name: @ikerin/directus-typegen
description: Generate Directus SDK TypeScript types from a schema snapshots

scripts.is-already-published: npm view @ikerin/directus-typegen versions --json | jq --exit-status 'any(. == $current)' --arg current $(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')
scripts.release: if [ $(bun run is-already-published) == true ]; then echo 'Already published'; else bun publish --access public; fi
